#summary View Members Gallery

*Case Number:* UC004

*Case Name:* View ISERN Members Gallery

*Description:* View gallery with all ISERN members.

*Actors:*
  * Researcher – An ISERN member
  * System – The MyISERN application

*Frequency:* Above Average

*Preconditions:*
  * The researcher is viewing the homepage.

*Postconditions:*
  * The researcher is viewing the gallery.

*Basic Course:*
|| *User* || *System* ||
|| 1. The researcher clicks on the view gallery link. || 2. The system loads the gallery page with thumbnails of all ISERN members and their names underneath the thumbnail. ||

*Change History:*
  * Created - 2007/10/21
